description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

+22 vs AC; 4d4+6 damage.

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

Amon Bassiri makes two dagger attacks

Encounter ✦ Weapon, Varies

Standard

+20 vs Reflex; 6d4+10 damage; Amon Bassiri can choose to do normal damage with this attack, or have the attack deal cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage instead.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Weapon

Standard

+22 vs AC; 4d4+17 damage; Amon Bassiri can shift 2 squares both before and after making this attack.

Encounter

Minor, Encounter

Close burst 10

Targets one creature; the target gains 10 vulnerability to cold, fire, lightning, or thunder (Amon's choice) until the end of Amon's next turn.

At-Will

Minor 1/Round

One eladrin ally within 5 squares of Amon (and in his line of sight) can shift 2 squares as a free action.

Encounter

Minor

Amon Bassiri gains a +5 bonus to Stealth checks until the end of his next turn.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Illusion

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When hit or missed by a melee attack

Amon Bassiri gains total concealment from the attacking creature until the end of the creature's next turn. Amon can use this power even in the radius of a revelation sphere and this power does not end when Amon enters the radius of a revelation sphere.
Amon Bassiri deals 3d6 extra damage against any target granting combat advantage to him.

AC 31Fort 29Ref 32Will 29
Speed 6

Cha 14 (+10)
Languages Common, Elven
Alignment Unaligned
Skills Arcana +13, Bluff +15, History +13, Stealth +20, Thievery +20Senses Low-light vision
Passive Perception 23 | Insight 23

Equipment watcher"s signet, dagger , leather armor .
